portal_text: Eh, soon I’ll earn big money... Many people are overwhelmed by this thought, but often big money can only be stolen. Therefore, today we will talk about famous scammers and thieves. It turns out that you can also gain world fame through theft.
description_1: One of the most famous counterfeiters in the world, his story formed the basis of the script for the film Catch Me If You Can
description_2: The creator of the well-known MMM pyramid
description_3: “Sold” the White House. Tried to sell the Statue of Liberty
description_4: Fraudster and swindler. He gained worldwide fame as “the man who sold the Eiffel Tower. Twice
